page.title: 13Shopping facilities (p.2)
page.content:
The cafe next door to the grocer's sells a plate of chips for 40p, sausage rolls for 8p, meat and potato pies for 35p, scones for 20p and ice-cream cornets for 25p. As the village is a well known beauty spot the cafe is very busy in the summer months.
At the hairdresser's a boy's or lady's haircut costs #2.50, a shampoo and set #2.50 and a perm #15.50. Hairsprays cost 95p.
At the greengrocer's tomatoes sell for 46p per pound, potatoes are 8p per pound, cauliflowers 46p each, bananas 45p per pound and melons 96p each. The greengrocer also delivers milk to half of the houses in the village before opening his shop.
